properties.entry: SELECT COMMUNITY_NO, COMMUNITY_NM, COMMUNITY_INFO, COMMUNITY_NOTICE, COMMUNITY_AREA, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, COMMUNITY_ADMIN, COMMUNITY_IMG FROM COMMUNITY JOIN MEMBER ON(MEMBER_NO = COMMUNITY_ADMIN) WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ? AND COMMUNITY_FL = 'N'
INSERT INTO COMMUNITY (COMMUNITY_NO, COMMUNITY_NM, COMMUNITY_INFO, COMMUNITY_AREA, COMMUNITY_FL, COMMUNITY_ADMIN, CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (SEQ_COMMUNITY_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, ?)
UPDATE APPLY SET APPLY_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND COMMUNITY_NO = ?
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMUNITY_ADMIN = (SELECT COMMUNITY_ADMIN FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ?) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE SET COMMUNITY_MEMBER MEMBER_FL = 'Y', DATE_FL = DEFAULT WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NO FROM COMMUNITY_MEMBER JOIN MEMBER (USING MEMBER_NO) WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ?

SELECT MEMBER_NO, COMMUNITY_NM, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG FROM APPLY JOIN COMMUNITY USING (COMMUNITY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ? ORDER BY APPLY_DATE
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMUNITY_FL = 'Y' WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ?
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMUNITY_IMG = ? WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ?
SELECT COMMUNITY_NM FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = ?
